bug.short_desc: TabView Buttons with close images cause other TabView Button to be rendered with the wrong height.

long_desc.thetext:
If the "closeImage" of a tab is too big (the default Image is to big), a space appears under every tab.
reported by Tobias Koller

Created attachment 95 Modified Schocase to show the bug
I just added this t1_1.setShowCloseButton(true); to line 471 in frontend\application\showcase\source\class\showcase\application.js
now you can see the bug on the tabDemo (Edit-Tab). All Tabs (except the Edit-Tab) got this space below now.
Created attachment 96 screenshot of the bug

This is because of the auto-size nature of the tabs. I think this is an issue which should be solved on the application side. I currently see no other way to automate this size syncronization needed in this case.
A work-around would be to add images to the other tabs, too. Even when only 1px width and with the same height as the close image. Other solution: Define a height for all tabview buttons.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.

attachment.desc: Modified Schocase to show the bug
